programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: An amnesiac professor and a doctor make up an unlikely teamas they flee from assassins and uncover a widescale lethal plot to take out half of the world's population.

programme.title: Hollywood Buzz
programme.desc: The program reviews the latest news and developments aboutfilms, interviews with new stars, and fashion in the American film capital.

programme.title: The Nice Guys
programme.desc: In 1970s Los Angeles, private investigator Holland March(Ryan Gosling) is forced to work with another private eye Jackson Healey (Russell Crowe) to investigate the mysterious death of a porn star and a missing girl.

programme.title: Limitless
programme.desc: Down on his luck, Eddie is introduced to an experimentaldrug that ends up turning his life around as it allows him to unlock his mind's full potential. However, his newfound abilities soon garner unwanted attention, which puts his life on the line just as he starts suffering from side effects.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically modified spider thatgives him superhuman abilities, while he secretly loves Mary. Norman Osborn, is an eccentric millionaire who uses a new form of performance-enhancing drugs to become the Green Goblin, so Peter must confront him to save his family and friends.

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Peter Parker is struggling to manage both his personal lifeand his duties as Spider-Man, facing Dr. Otto Octavius, who after a failed experiment and his wife's death, uses his mechanical tentacles and threatens to endanger the lives of New York City's residents. Spider-Man must stop him from annihilating the city.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: After (Spider-Man) gets the key to the city for saving themayor's life and the city as a whole, he becomes vain and his relationship with (Mary Jane) is strained. He then encounters a parasitic creature from outer space who has the ability to create an evil aggressive spirit.

programme.title: Ender's Game
programme.desc: Seventy years after a horrific war with aliens, anexceptionally gifted child is sent to an advanced military school in space to prepare for the future invasion.

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: Major Mira Killian is the first person of her kind in thenear future: a human salvaged from a horrific accident who has been cyber-enhanced to become an ideal soldier committed to apprehending the most dangerous criminals on the planet.

programme.title: Limitless
programme.desc: Down on his luck, Eddie is introduced to an experimentaldrug that ends up turning his life around as it allows him to unlock his mind's full potential. However, his newfound abilities soon garner unwanted attention, which puts his life on the line just as he starts suffering from side effects.

programme.title: 21 Bridges
programme.desc: With Manhattan locked down to aid with the search for a pairof cop killers, Det. Andre Davis slowly puts together the clues of a vast conspiracy that puts a different spin on their manhunt.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: When a crime boss threatens to harm his girlfriend, Baby isforced to participate in a heist with a few volatile individuals, which makes the whole thing a recipe for disaster.

programme.title: Fool's Gold
programme.desc: Finn and his ex-wife Tess embark on a treasure hunt thatrekindles the flames of their love.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically modified spider thatgives him superhuman abilities, while he secretly loves Mary. Norman Osborn, is an eccentric millionaire who uses a new form of performance-enhancing drugs to become the Green Goblin, so Peter must confront him to save his family and friends.

programme.title: Step Up Revolution
programme.desc: Emily arrives in Miami, with big dreams of becoming aprofessional dancer. She meets Sean, who leads a dancing crew. They discover that Emily's father, a wealthy businessman, plans to demolish the neighborhood as part of a development plan, and she has to stand up against her father in order to protect their neighborhood, all expressed through their dancing.

programme.title: Hollywood Buzz
programme.desc: The program reviews the latest news and developments aboutfilms, interviews with new stars, and fashion in the American film capital.

programme.title: Ender's Game
programme.desc: Seventy years after a horrific war with aliens, anexceptionally gifted child is sent to an advanced military school in space to prepare for the future invasion.

programme.title: Scoop Maa Raya
programme.desc: The Lebanese presenter Raya Abirached reviews the latestfilms shown in American cinema and the changes that occur in them weekly. She also reveals the latest news of Hollywood celebs and their accessories and covers the most important international festivals.

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: When he is whisked away from his dull London orphanage,life, the twelve-year-old Peter finds himself in the magical Neverland, where fun is just another word for danger and vice versa. Many adventures send Peter exploring more about himself and his world, eventually becoming an immortal hero.

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: A young kid meets author R.L Stine's niece in the town ofGreendale, Maryland, following one of the writer's turns in which he uncovers his imagination's demons.

programme.title: Dark Shadows
programme.desc: When Barnabas slights Angelique and breaks her heart, hediscovers that hell truly hath no fury like a woman scorned. Angelique, a witch, takes her revenge by burying him alive after cursing him with vampirism. When he is finally freed centuries later, he emerges to a whole new world.

programme.title: Moonrise Kingdom
programme.desc: Set in the sixties, in an island in New England, a12-year-old boy and girl fall in love and secretly plan to run away together. This angers the authorities in the island, and the situation escalates to the point where they attempt to track the young couple in all directions.

programme.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
programme.desc: The story of Gustave H (Ralph Fiennes) the legendaryconcerige at a famous Hotel ,who befriends the lobby boy Zero Mustafa (Tony Revolori). When Madame D. (Tilda Swinton) is killed , her son Dmitry (Adrien Brody) decides to take revenge on Gustave, while everyone is after a priceless painting.

programme.title: Step Up Revolution
programme.desc: Emily arrives in Miami, with big dreams of becoming aprofessional dancer. She meets Sean, who leads a dancing crew. They discover that Emily's father, a wealthy businessman, plans to demolish the neighborhood as part of a development plan, and she has to stand up against her father in order to protect their neighborhood, all expressed through their dancing.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: A young woman, after a long travel, ends up at the BatesHotel, which contains a set of horrific secrets.

programme.desc: A program that offers a look at the latest films that arepremiering in international theaters, and the film scenes that baffled audiences, in addition to many exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Man on Fire
programme.desc: Based in Mexico, ex-FBI agent John Creasy is hired toprotect nine-year-old Pita Ramos, who gets kidnapped. Creasy swears to stop at nothing to get revenge from her kidnappers.

programme.title: Transporter 3
programme.desc: Frank Martin finds himself tasked with transporting theEnvironmental Agency Minister's daughter under dangerous circumstances.

programme.title: The Fountain
programme.desc: Across three eras, three different men share one goal: tofind the tree of life that could grant them eternity with the women they love. Despite their different backgrounds and different times, they are all beset by their fight against human frailty and mortality, fighting to preserve their love.

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: A program that is shown every Sunday, covering news from theworld of Hollywood. It also provides scenes of films, revenues, and many topics and news of interest to cinema lovers around the world.

programme.title: Taken 2
programme.desc: The past comes back to haunt former CIA operative BryanMills when the father of one of the kidnappers he killed to rescue his daughter Kim comes after him and his family. With Bryan and his ex-wife captured, it's up to Kim to help her father escape his captors and save her mother.

programme.title: The Beaver
programme.desc: With his life rapidly going down the drain, a depressedexecutive finds an innovative way of communication by adopting a beaver hand-puppet that helps him work through his issues and start to reach out to his family.

programme.title: Action Zone
programme.desc: A program that offers a look at the latest films that arepremiering in international theaters, and the film scenes that baffled audiences, in addition to many exclusive interviews.

programme.title: The Shallows
programme.desc: Nancy, a surfer, is attacked by a great white shark just 200yards off the coast, and her short voyage to safety ends in a titanic struggle for survival.

programme.title: Scoop Maa Raya
programme.desc: The Lebanese presenter Raya Abirached reviews the latestfilms shown in American cinema and the changes that occur in them weekly. She also reveals the latest news of Hollywood celebs and their accessories and covers the most important international festivals.

programme.title: Zodiac
programme.desc: A serial killer calling himself Zodiac taunts the police bysharing the details of his murders and sending cryptic messages to the press. A police officer, a journalist and a cartoonist form an unlikely team to hunt him down.

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: The life of an unemployed family living in a poor apartmentchanges completely when the son becomes the English tutor for the daughter of a wealthy family. As the lives of the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim family intersect, what follows is a web of deceit and disturbing violence.

programme.title: The Conjuring: The Devil Made Me Do It
programme.desc: When a murder takes place, two top paranormal investigators,Ed and Lorraine, scrumble to figure out the truth of a murderer claiming to be possessed by a demon.

programme.title: Doctor Sleep
programme.desc: Traumatized by his childhood experience at the OverlookHotel, Dan has struggled to move on and lead a peaceful existence where his "shining" isn't a curse. When he comes across Abra, a teen with a strong shining, he enters a desperate fight to save her from a cult that feeds on children's shining.

programme.title: The Shallows
programme.desc: Nancy, a surfer, is attacked by a great white shark just 200yards off the coast, and her short voyage to safety ends in a titanic struggle for survival.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: What starts as a celebrated scientific discovery of life onMars soon turns into a nightmare when the life form, a single-celled organism, turns hostile and attacks the crew aboard the space station.

programme.title: 47 Meters Down: Uncaged
programme.desc: In this sequel, four teenage girls go diving in a ruinedunderwater city, discover that they are not alone in a maze of submerged caves and that they've entered the territory of fierce sharks.

programme.title: Brick Mansions
programme.desc: In a dystopian future, an unlikely partnership is formedbetween an ex-con and an undercover cop in the walled-off Detroit. With a local kingpin threatening to destroy the whole city, the two men must find a common ground in order to bring him down.

programme.title: Unfaithful
programme.desc: A fateful encounter with a stranger puts the stable, albeittepid, marriage of Connie and Edward on the line as Connie starts an affair with the stranger, Paul. As Edward suspects that his wife is cheating on him, he comes to realize that there is a dark side to his anger.

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: A program that is shown every Sunday, covering news from theworld of Hollywood. It also provides scenes of films, revenues, and many topics and news of interest to cinema lovers around the world.

programme.title: Runaway Jury
programme.desc: As a young widow takes a gun manufacturer to court, thetrial turns into a three-way struggle to control the verdict. Between the prosecution, the defense and its jury consultant, and one of the jurors, the attempt to sway the jury becomes a game of wits.

programme.title: Acrimony
programme.desc: Melinda is an honest and faithful wife, who decides to turnthings against her cheating husband, after confirming his unfaithfulness.

programme.title: Alice, Darling
programme.desc: As Alice is pushed to the edge by her abusive boyfriend, sheembarks on a journey of self-discovery as she goes on vacation with her two best friends.

programme.title: The Girl on the Train
programme.desc: A troubled divorc√©e gets tangled up in a dangerous web ofsecrets and lies, after she witnesses something shocking while taking the train.

programme.title: Gone Girl
programme.desc: On the occasion of his fifth wedding anniversary, Nick Dunnereports that his wife, Amy, has gone missing. Under pressure from the police and a growing media frenzy, Nick's portrait of a blissful union begins to crumble. Soon his lies, deceits and strange behavior have everyone asking the same dark question: Did Nick Dunne kill his wife?

programme.title: Bombshell
programme.desc: A group of women try to take on Fox News head, Roger Ailes,due to his administration policy and the toxic male culture he is spreading in the network.

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: When Smurfette is kidnapped by the evil wizard Gargamel, herlittle blue cohorts rally their human friends to help rescue her. And the stakes are high, as she has discovered a secret spell that can turn Gargamel's newest creation, creatures called the Naughties, into real Smurfs.

programme.title: Space Jam: A New Legacy
programme.desc: After NBA superstar LeBron James finds himself trapped withhis son in a virtual space, he must join forces with Bugs Bunny and the rest of the Looney Tunes gang to win a fateful basketball game against the Goon Squad and get back home with his son.
